sentence.Network_en: Nuclear change and acrosomal formation were studied on spermatogenesis of chlamys farreri by transmission electronic microscope.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 赫耳墨斯的形象为精力充沛的青年，头戴宽边帽(petasus)，身披短斗篷(chlamys)，手持双蛇杖(kerykeion)，腰系钱币袋，脚穿有翼鞋(pteroeis pedila)。

means.word_mean: 1. collective term for the outer parts of a flower consisting of the calyx and corolla and enclosing the stamens and pistils
2. a short mantle or cape fastened at the shoulder; worn by men in ancient Greece
